item.title: #en @ 1442863012474355712
item.description: Dear authors, I appreciate when your manuscript I receive for review includes a link to data, but please remove IP-addresses, participant location, and other info that renders your participants identifiable. Open data is important but participant privacy is even more important!

item.description: First at the #MicroplasticDataWorkshop from Paul Helm: Studies should report methods clearly so that we know which studies we can compare. Currently, the field is not following FAIR data principles. Data is collected for specific purposes. @UW_Ecohydrology @water_institute 1/2
